document_data.name: Half-goblin
document_data.mainbody: '''Half-goblins''' were humanoids born from a pairing of [[goblin]]s with another race, such as [[human]]s. They could be found wherever such a pairing took place, notably in [[Icewind Dale]] and the [[Dustwall Mountains]].
document_data.Description: Half-goblins with human blood were taller than regular goblins. Their eyes had colors on the human spectrum, such as blue, rather than the standard goblin red.
document_data.Notable half-goblins: * [[Zeth]], a blind half-human who lived isolated from the rest of his goblin tribe in the [[Dustwallows]]. Granted magical sight by his tribe's shaman, Zeth led a war party on a quest to redeem both himself and his tribe for being human-like.
